properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvaa nee paripoornatha nundi Ponditimi krupavembadi krupanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvaina Yesu kristu paraloka vishayamulo Prati aasheervaadamunu prasaadinchitivi maaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janakaa nee vennukonina Janula Kshemamu joochi Santoshinchunatlu nanu jnaapakamunchukonumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu swaastyamainatti nee prajalatho kalisi Koniyaadunatlugaa nanu jnaapakamunchukonumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devaa nee prajala yedala dina dinamu neekunna ghanudaa Needu dayatho nanu jnaapakamunchukonumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devaa needu swaroopa divya darshanamunu Dina dinamu naa kosagi nanu jnaapakamunchukonumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mee madyana naa aatma unnadi bhayapadaku Danina mahonnathudaa nanu jnaapakamunchukonumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mudamaara nannenukoni mudra yungaramuganu Chetunanina prabhuvaa nanu jnaapakamunchukonumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Krupaa satya sammilitha sampoorna swaroopa Halleluyaa Neeke prabho ellappudu kalugugaaka{/lang-eng}
